exceptions.exn: The LHS of opp_mult_r (opp (mult _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Nat.mul_comm (_ * _)%nat does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment K : Ring x, y : K Unable to unify "mult (opp x) y" with "mult x (opp y)".

original: intros x y. rewrite opp_mult_r. rewrite opp_mult_r. rewrite mult_comm. reflexivity.
